path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - RENEC Oracle and PeggedFiat - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: Unable to use product account after change base/quote
findings.description: The product account will be unable to pass the check of Anchor because the seeds have been changed when set_product_tokens is called with another token for base/quote.

findings.title: Wrong comments
findings.description: There are some wrong comments in lock_n_mint handler, the correct must be lock base and mint quote.
